extendedInfo.description: ***Launch Sale 50% OFF!***Fascinating Singleplayer Strategy Game Intense Audiovisual Experience Based on the popular Flash Game with 25 Million Fans â¢ 80 Missions in an Exceptional Campaign Mode A contaminated alien organism is about to die... Take a deep look inside, while it launches its final defense program. Enter a microscopic world of cells, neurons and DNA tentacles. Take control of the last antibody cells and save the entire species from extinction. â¢ Make the Impossible Possible You can cure the organism by capturing enemy cells. To do this, draw a line between green antibody and red enemy cells. This will launch DNA tentacles which drain energy from enemy cell cores and eventually overtake them. Keep an eye on your energy supply and boost your attacks by cutting the tentacles. Capture all enemy cells to secure a zone. Cure all zones and the life form will surviveâ¦ â¢ Furious Enemy Beware of an intelligent and wide awake enemy which fights back without ever giving up. Youâll need to stay focused and master the art of âTentacle Warâ in order to prevent the death of your host. â All New Game Experience â Easy to Get Into, Hard to Put Down â HD Display Support â Microscopic World â Suspenseful Atmosphere â 80 Single Player Missions â Original Soundtrack â Optional Random Level Generator

reviews.title: Greatest game ever
reviews.comment: Awesome game I have ever played, great ingenuity put into it. Wish there were more levels, but great graphics and smooth frame work. I hope more levels come later.
reviews.author: Gabriel reeves

reviews.title: Great stragety game
reviews.comment: Great stragety game with nice visuals and great ambiance
reviews.author: Troy Henry

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Good game, fun and entertaining game with good graphics but it needs GPGS support
reviews.author: Fionn O\' Reilly

reviews.title: Pass all
reviews.comment: Good game , just pass all with 3 stars each. Just need to find the right paths to solve it. Very good game.
reviews.author: Shane Chen

reviews.comment: 4 stars because the gameplay is incredible and addicting, but I feel there should be more campaign levels for the price.
reviews.author: Steve Barta

reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: Love it definitely worth the money. Now if only I could get by some 69 lol
reviews.author: Chris Smith

reviews.title: Hardest game I\'ve played.
reviews.comment: If you want a strategic challenge this is the best I\'ve played so far. Always had me quitting in frustration but then coming back for more!
reviews.author: Simon Blackwell

reviews.title: Challenging strategy game
reviews.comment: Higher levels often take a lot of patience to figure out how to beat. The game forces you to rate it in order to unlock random levels, even after having paid for it, so one star off for that.
reviews.author: Eric Crampton

reviews.title: Outstanding!
reviews.comment: Similar aspects to \"little stars for little wars\"but also unique..brilliant
reviews.author: G Bon

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I don\'t normally pay for games but if you have a couple of bucks, you should get this game... It is worth every cent!
reviews.author: Jordan Tucker

reviews.title: Awesome and Challenging
reviews.comment: This game is a breath of fresh air. The concept is creative and has a surprising ammount of depth. The puzzles are very challenging which makes them rewarding. Best android game I\'ve played.
reviews.author: Luis Rosias

reviews.title: Early is fun, Late is not.
reviews.comment: It\'s a fun idea and starts well enough. About half way through it becomes a game all about trying to guess what bizarre tactic the designer thought was the right one. Obviously balanced to try to force people to buy more of the real money win buttons.
reviews.author: Jameson York

reviews.title: Sleep Freeze Issue
reviews.comment: As I am playing the screen will sleep and the game freezes. It is a pain. Love the game but unplayable as it is right now.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Alston

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Fun challenging puzzle game that keeps you on your feet. Loved the browser versions, and I love the mobile version
reviews.author: Timothy Bentley

reviews.title: Forced to rate.
reviews.comment: Good game.  I bought it and now to unlock a mode I have to rate it... so that\'s why 3 stars.  Hint hint developers!
reviews.author: Jeff R

reviews.title: Forced to rate
reviews.comment: It\'s always bad business to force people to rste your app
reviews.author: Gr\303\251gory Thurin

reviews.title: So fun!
reviews.comment: This is a great game that requires both strategy and speed. I wish there were different difficulty levels or a casual mode.
reviews.author: Shane Johnson

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Absolutely brilliant, highly addictive !
reviews.author: Mighty Matt

reviews.title: AWESOME!!
reviews.comment: If you like a challenge this is the game for you
reviews.author: Mike Thompson

reviews.title: Forces you to rate.
reviews.comment: But still a good game. If it didn\'t force you to rate it would be five stars. Games should be so good they make you want to rate them. Not force you to rate them.
reviews.author: Mitchell Bloomfield
